mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and use responsive frameworks like Bootstrap to enhance mobile experience.
loadingSpeedTip: Compress and optimize images, minify CSS/JS files to improve loading time.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword usage and meta tags, and implement schema markup for rich results.
userExperienceTip: Simplify navigation and ensure consistent branding across pages.
bookingFlowTip: Add clearer call-to-action buttons and streamline the booking form to reduce friction.
tips: Ensure faster loading times by optimizing resources.
Improve SEO by enhancing meta information and adding more relevant content.
